knimeNode.name: Display NCBI
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays a NCBI Record in a text area.

fullDescription.intro:
Displays a NCBI Record in a text area.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: The NCBI ID column (e.g. a PMID)
